name: Sona Masoori Rice
description: Medium grain raw rice sourced from local villages of Andhra Pradesh. Aged up to 6 months before packaging with a rich and unique aroma.

name: HMT Rice
description: This is a high-quality, medium-grain rice variety that is popular in Telangana. It is known for its taste and texture, making it suitable for a variety of dishes.

name: Brown Rice
description: Whole grain rice, rich in magnesium, phosphorus, and antioxidants. Ideal for a healthy diet.

name: Basmati Rice
description: Long grain aromatic rice traditionally from the Indian subcontinent. Known for its distinct fragrance and flavor.

name: Idly Rice
description: A variety specifically used for making idlis, a popular South Indian dish. This rice has a high starch content, which helps in fermenting the idli batter effectively.

name: Nellore Rice
description: Originating from the Nellore district, this rice variety is known for its fine grains and superior taste. It's often used for special occasions and traditional dishes.

name: Black Rice
description: This is a less common but highly nutritious variety of rice that is grown in smaller quantities. It is rich in antioxidants and has a unique flavor.
